name: Mobius of Magic
description:
Embark on an epic journey across the world of Everwind!

= STORY =

Your adventure begins at the Harbour of Thal'mur, where you have been training with your master, Roku the Sorcerer. After completing your final test, your master asks your to deliver an ancient relic to Leena, a mistress of White Magic. Unaware of the adventure you are about to get involved, a Shadow has started pulling the strings of an evil plan that will threaten the peace of the entire world...

= KEY FEATURES =

- Play as a Sorcerer's apprentice in an epic old-school RPG adventure brought to the modern times.
- Visit incredibly hand-crafted locations: From deep dark caves and ancient forests, to unexplored ever-raining mountains and flamboyant cities.
- Crush your enemies alone or with the help of the mystical creatures called Familiars and unravel the story behind the Dragon Fang.
- Think turn-based combats are boringly slow-paced? Think again! Fight your opponents with a deep and dynamic turn-based combat system specifically designed for touch-screen devices.
- Meet unique characters and learn more than 20 different spells from them: Alchemists, Shamans, Elementalists and Summoners are just some of them!
- No In-App purchases or waiting times! Once you purchase the game, you get to enjoy the whole experience. Just like in the old times!
